mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tbuser (strUserName, strPassword, strSalt, strPhone, strEmali, nIdentity, strLogoUrl, nState, dtCreateTime, dtModifyTime, nLock) values (#{strusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strsalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stremali,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nidentity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{strlogourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dtmodifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nLock,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tbuser set strUserName = #{strusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, strPassword = #{strpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, strSalt = #{strsalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, strPhone = #{strphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, strEmali = #{stremali,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nIdentity = #{nidentity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, strLogoUrl = #{strlogourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nState = #{nstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nLock = #{nLock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dtCreateTime = #{dtcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dtModifyTime = #{dtmodifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where lId = #{lid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select lId, strUserName, strPassword, strSalt, strPhone, strEmali, nIdentity, strLogoUrl, nLock nState, dtCreateTime, dtModifyTime from tbuser where lId = #{lid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select lId, strUserName, strPassword, strSalt, strPhone, strEmali, nIdentity, strLogoUrl, nLock nState, dtCreateTime, dtModifyTime from tbuser
select lId, strUserName, strPassword, strSalt, strPhone, strEmali, nIdentity, strLogoUrl,nLock nState, dtCreateTime, dtModifyTime from tbuser where strUserName = #{strUserName}
select lId, strUserName, strPassword, strSalt, strPhone, strEmali, nIdentity, strLogoUrl,nLock nState, dtCreateTime, dtModifyTime from tbuser where strPhone = #{strPhone}
